verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Jesus I love Thee
Not because
I hope for heav'n there-by
Nor yet because if I love not
I must forever die

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I love Thee Savior dear and still
I ever will love Thee
Solely because my God Thou art
Who first hast loved me

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
For me to lowest depths of woe
Thou didst Thyself abase
For me didst bear
The cross and shame
And manifold disgrace

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
For me didst
Suffer pains unknown
Blood-sweat and agony
Yea death itself all all for me
Who was Thine enemy

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
Then why
O blessed Savior mine
Should I not love Thee well
Not for the sake
Of winning heaven
Nor of escaping hell

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Not with
The hope of gaining aught
Nor seeking a reward
But freely fully as Thyself
Hast loved me O Lord

verse.name: v7
verse.lines:
E'en so I love Thee
And will love
And in Thy praise will sing
Solely because
Thou art my God
And my eternal King
